RelatedSentence: The Acting Senior Humanitarian Coordinator ( SHC ) in the Central African Republic , Kouassi Lazare Etien unequivocally condemns the killing of the French photojournalist Camille Lepage and extends heartfelt condolences to the victim 's family .

The Acting Senior Humanitarian Coordinator ( SHC ) in the Central African Republic , Kouassi Lazare Etien unequivocally condemns the killing of the French photojournalist Camille Lepage and extends heartfelt condolences to the victim 's family .
Camille Lepage lost her life in the western region of Bouar on 13 May 2014 while on a reporting assignment .

A1: The Acting Senior Humanitarian Coordinator -LRB- SHC -RRB- in the Central African Republic , Kouassi Lazare Etien
RelatedSentence: I am deeply saddened by the loss of this dedicated media professional .

In accordance with international humanitarian law , media personnel engaged in armed conflict situations are considered as civilians and must be respected and protected , said the Acting Humanitarian Coordinator .
Through their quest and publication of information , journalists help to highlight the needs of the people we are assisting .
